channel.title: HELP with server
channel.description: Ok i need to know what to do i got to compile bat and hit its says hit "r" to runs erver whne i do it says"You do not have a Server.class.Make sure you used the compiler with your server BEFORE you try and runing it"...Please help!)thankyou)..and also it says when i go to compile it says"'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.HELP ME PLEASE(thanksyou)

item.title: HELP with server

item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

find the compiler and right-click then click edit

replace that code with the above

item.title: HELP with server
item.dc:creator: @kc1111 kc1111
item.description:
@kc1111 wrote:

how do i change the compiler?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP with server
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

change your compiler to:

@ECHO OFF
TITLE ServerName Compiler
color a
"%homedrive%\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"%homedrive%\\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" server
pause

change your runserver to

REM Written by Lamez
@echo off
SET name=ServerName

:start
color a
cls
TITLE Do You Want To Compile?
ECHO [Y]es or [N]o
ECHO.
SET/p do=Do You Want To Compile Before Run?:^>

if "%do%" equ "y" goto comp
if "%do%" equ "Y" goto comp
if "%do%" equ "n" goto server
if "%do%" equ "N" goto server
if "%do%" equ "" goto error

ECHO.

:error
color c
cls
ECHO.
title ERROR!
ECHO That is not a command!
ECHO.
ECHO Please Enter: Y or N
ECHO.
ECHO Press Any Key To Continue!
PAUSE>NUL
GOTO start

:comp
cls
ECHO.
call compile.bat

goto server

:server



cls
TITLE %name%
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Read full topic
